{{Quote|Steel is the only thing that a woman can depend on.|Shar-Teel}}
document_data.Personality:
Extremely aggressive and bloodthirsty, Shar-Teel had a strong hatred of men. She enjoyed humiliating male adventurers by challenging them to duels and soundly thrashing them.

She also had a particular dislike for the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company.
document_data.Relationships: Shar-Teel was the daughter of [[Angelo Dosan]], a lieutenant in the Flaming Fist who was secretly employed by [[Sarevok Anchev]].
